5.16.17  1:56 pm   How often do you shave your piano?
5.16.17  1:55 pm   Where do you get your invisible drumsets from?
5.16.17  1:45 pm   Are you afraid of the idea of being labeled a sell-out, even if selling out helps you make more content and people still mostly like your stuff?
5.16.17  1:39 pm   Hey Bill, when are you going to comment on that masterpiece of a new video of yours?
5.16.17  12:54 pm   Which has been your biggest achievement in life?
5.16.17  12:43 pm   How many times have you answered a question with "oh hell yeah"?
5.16.17  12:16 pm   If pinocchio said "my nose will now grow," what would happen?
5.16.17  12:02 pm   When will you finish making HOTEWIG
5.16.17  11:47 am   Did you made history of the world alone?
5.16.17  11:43 am   What's next?
5.16.17  9:07 am   What foreign language is your favourite or the one you'd love to learn?
5.16.17  8:48 am   Hi Bill are you planning to drop an LP or an EP or something that is a collection of your v good work at some point?
5.16.17  8:46 am   What do you think about the Netherlands?
5.16.17  8:22 am   What is a thing
5.16.17  8:17 am   How to make good chords?
5.16.17  8:01 am   is the universe my friend or not
5.16.17  7:21 am   What will you do next after you answer this question?
5.16.17  6:36 am   have you ever considered employing/hiring someone to help you with your videos? there are obviously pros and cons to that idea, what is your opinion on it?
5.16.17  5:45 am   Which do you think came first? The chicken or the egg?
5.16.17  4:43 am   Do you enjoy answering these questions? Seems like hard work.
5.16.17  3:43 am   Does working on new projects like you do improve things like time feel & technique better than actual practice for you?

5.16.17  3:27 am   "The ocean is made of plastic"-- that last EM13#11 is a color (and voicing) I never hear through out the video. Was it intentional for that chord to be more different than any other throughout the vid? And did you intend for that chord to come out the color blue?
5.16.17  3:19 am   How does someone who's always working on a massive new project, like you, balance that with a relationship?
5.16.17  3:17 am   I can't describe your style. It's everywhere you touch. your videos, your music, heck even your website How do you describe it?
5.16.17  2:29 am   All animals can scream.
5.16.17  2:14 am   if I ask you a question now, will you have a different answer if I ask the same question later?
5.16.17  2:13 am   if asked, would you be an astronaut?

5.16.17  1:56 am   Is it illegal to rip the tags off of pillows and sheets?

      They're really annoying.
5.16.17  1:04 am   how does it feel to receive questions among other things from a faceless mass of individuals with apparent but elusive distinct qualities?
5.16.17  12:39 am   How long from now will the English language separate into officially different languages due to the variation in accent. ie.) Scottish v. Southern Bumpkin in the US
5.16.17  12:06 am   in hotewig you spelled "lazer," but just in case you didn't know, what you were referring to is actually spelled "laser." either is fine according to autocorrect though.
5.16.17  12:04 am   You love to say you're trying to be reasonable, why? Being reasonable is boring.
5.15.17  11:56 pm   I found the secret questions page! How long has that been there?

5.15.17  11:56 pm   what do the numbers "240" in your room mean? they are my phone number's area code and i'm wondering if you are thefting my identity. they're also a numerical anagram of "420" which I find more likely, but I can't be sure.

5.15.17  11:52 pm   ME: Seeing the projects you manage to finish and seeing that you do not even try to make money from them B.W: that's not true, i do try to make money from them, in ways that i find reasonable ME: makes me feel bad about myself. What can I do to feel less bad? Thank you for the information but can you please answer the final question? Or at least let me know that you do not want to. Feels like you just overlooked it.
5.15.17  11:01 pm   Do you have dank memes

5.15.17  10:21 pm   My friend really enjoyed your Japan and history of the world hotewig video. There was only one problem. He asked "who is this guy?" I told him "bill wurtz" but I didn't exactly know how to define who you are and what you do. How can I define who you are and what you do?
5.15.17  10:15 pm   if you could master one subject what would it be?

5.15.17  9:51 pm   Do you think humanity will go extinct before the sun explodes?
